channel.title: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop
channel.description: I'm adding a "shop" button in my dungeoneering tab, and I want to make it so that when you click on it it opens up a certain shop id. what is the code I need to make the case open the shop?

item.title: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:6, topic:404666”] case CLICK_ID: if (c.inWild()) { return; } c.getShops().openShop(SHOP_ID); break; [/quote]

My bad fixed it.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop

item.title: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

i’ve got everything, but how do I declare .c.getShops.openShop?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop

item.title: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

case CLICK_ID:
if (c.inWild()) {
return;
}
c.getShops.openShop(SHOP_ID);
break;

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop

Go to rsinterface, on the next new line add dung shop compile click it open your run cmd it will tell you the action button then open clicking buttons and make it open a shop with the button it showed in your run cmd.

item.title: [PI]How to make Clicking on a button open up a shop
